long_description: Great for traveling yogis and those who like close contact with the ground, the Jade Travel yoga mat is only 0.125-in. thick. Constructed of open cell natural rubber, a renewable resource from rubber trees; mat contains no PVC. Natural rubber provides excellent slip resistance even when wet with perspiration. Hand wash mat with mild soap and warm water; hang or lay flat to dry out of direct sunlight.
short_description: Great for traveling yogis and those who like close contact with the ground, the Jade Travel yoga mat is only 0.125-in. thick.
